TopicTitle: How do you embed Twitch Highlights?

Articles.Content:
Anyone know how?

I'm posting this question here as it doesn't really fit under "unmodded KSP support" or "general" or the rest. If there is a better place, please tell so I can post there instead.

Edited December 26, 2014 by Avera9eJoe

I don't use Twitch much, so I'm not 100% on exactly what you mean, but as far as I know, the only currently permitted way to embed Twitch is with the twitch BBCode: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/misc.php?do=bbcode#twitch
Twitch highlights can not be embedded. Only the channel itself, as it appears live.
